Class InstanceUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.threecrickets.prudence.util.InstanceUtil

public abstract class InstanceUtil
extends Object

Utility methods to assist in accessing the running Prudence instance.

getApplication

public static Application getApplication(String name)
Gets an application associated with the current Prudence instance.

Expects that a map of applications was set in the "com.threecrickets.prudence.applications" attribute of the component's context.

Parameters:
name - The application's full name
Returns:
The application or null
